content.body: I feel like the decorator proposal needs a giant section explaining why the metadata has like public/private sections and such. It's probably intuitive to the designers, but reading the proposal it's not. I saw: https://github.com/tc39/proposal-decorators/issues/427 which brings this up also tying the metadata to the property.
